items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 45 check-ins with a photo.

items.checkin_comment: Excellent pine and caramel aroma, taste is somewhat vegetal, refreshing, bitter. Good, a bit odd.

Part of the craft beer revolution in the holy land. 
Gotta check'em all!
